titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-567, by Mr. Sessions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 195.

bill.summary: Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII to provide for consideration of H.R. 4614 (FY 2005 energy and water development appropriations).
